title: Watch: Neeraj Chopra’s throw that won India its first  Athletics World Championships gold medal
content:
#WorldAthleticsChamps #Budapest202388.17m, a number that will go down in the history of Indian athleticsNeeraj Chopra is a World Champion!pic.twitter.com/lMwwmDyEqt— The Field (@thefield_in) August 27, 2023

Athletics World Championships: Neeraj Chopra clinches India’s first World Championships gold
